thread.title: Black Monday diary: Eight hours at a financial advice firm in the midst of market meltdown
thread.title_full: Black Monday diary: Eight hours at a financial advice firm in the midst of market meltdown

author: Sean Howlett
title: Black Monday diary: Eight hours at a financial advice firm in the midst of market meltdown
text: China Black Monday diary: Eight hours at a financial advice firm in the midst of market meltdown When China's markets went into freefall, some clients panicked and sold everything they had - while others played the long game An investor monitors stock data on an electronic board at a securities brokerage house in Beijing Photo: EPA/ROLEX DELA PENA By Sean Howlett
